text: On the bridge, Riker orders Troi to evacuate everyone to the saucer section and Data to prepare to separate the ship.
(points his weapon at Torg) "Say the wrong thing, Torg!!"
Halfway up he is greeted by Spock, who has followed him wearing levitation boots.
As Gillian and Kirk drive away, Spock is beamed back aboard the Bounty.
